tool_description: Validates return requests against company policies, checking eligibility criteria such as return window, item condition requirements, and policy exceptions.

return_id.description: Unique return request identifier to validate

order_date.description: Original order date for return window calculation

return_policy_days.description: Number of days allowed for returns (typically 30, 60, or 90)

item_category.description: Product category: electronics, clothing, books, consumables, custom_made

original_payment_method.description: Original payment method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, cash

is_final_sale.description: Whether the item was marked as final sale

override_reason.description: Reason for policy override if applicable

error_messages: Return not found: The specified return_id does not exist in the system. Verify the return identifier.
Invalid date format: order_date must be in valid ISO 8601 format. Use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.
Invalid item category: Use one of [electronics, clothing, books, consumables, custom_made].
Invalid payment method: Use one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, cash].
Policy days out of range: return_policy_days must be between 1 and 365 days.
usage: Provide return_id, order_date, item_category, and original_payment_method. Optionally set return_policy_days, is_final_sale, and override_reason. The tool checks all policy conditions and determines authorization status.

authorization_status.description: Authorization result: approved, denied, or requires_review

denial_reason.description: Specific reason if return is denied

approval_conditions.description: Any special conditions for the approved return

days_since_purchase.description: Number of days between order date and validation
